Text: Green PurchasesHello Richard I have been trying to come up with the number and am having difficulty Please email me the missing numbers It would be a big help I would send you my spreadsheet but it can get pretty confusing There are so many combinations Most of your numbers agree with the auditors numbers However there are a few that do not but are listed on the proof of purchase from EPMI Then some of those purchases dont seem to be reported on the MPR Another scenario is where I found numbers on the MPR that agree with the auditor but not youthen again those could be the missing numbers Anyway sorry this is taking so long Once I get all the numbers from you hopefully I can wrap this up I received the email from Heather Raitt I briefly looked over it but havent spent much time on it yet Thanks Richard And again sorry for the delay Mary ps Please respond to this email address I will be working from home the rest of the week Thanks Sent via the EV webmail system at mailevnet
